body:
```
/blues/gpfs/home/software/spack-0.9.1/lib/spack/spack/repository.py:81: DeprecationWarning: object.__init__() takes no parameters
  super(ModuleType, self).__init__(self, namespace)
```

It seems like the super class of ModuleType is object, so there must be a bug in here. @tgamblin, it seems like you're the only one to edit this file recently.
title: DeprecationWarning in repository.py
